story.text: (Adds details) Jan 3 (Reuters) - HOME DEPOT INC. (HD.N) Current Prior Rating Strong buy Outperform Price target $50 $47 --The upgrade by Raymond James comes after the company said its Chairman and Chief Executive Robert Nardelli resigned. The brokerage said 2007 was likely to be a better year than 2006 for the home building retailer, its management, and the stock. --The brokerage said the launch of a proxy fight by an investor to elect two board members, and conduct a review of the company strategy, management performance, and strategic options will boost the share price in the near term. --Raymond James said it expected the Home Depot stock to move higher as the earnings outlook clears. A recent $3 billion accelerated share repurchase and recently increased dividend provide additional support for the shares, it added. (Reporting by Rakesh Dubey in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - raymond james ups
